column2: This is a multicenter study of patients undergoing therapeutic bronchoscopy for malignant central airway obstruction using the American College of Chest Physicians (CHEST) Quality Improvement Registry, Evaluation, and Education (AQuIRE) program registry data. It yields some valuable data about variation in practice patterns among different institutions, complications of therapeutic bronchoscopy, and the risks factors for complications. This is a multicenter study of patients undergoing therapeutic bronchoscopy for malignant central airway obstruction using the American College of Chest Physicians (CHEST) Quality Improvement Registry, Evaluation, and Education (AQuIRE) program registry data. It yields some valuable data about variation in practice patterns among different institutions, complications of therapeutic bronchoscopy, and the risks factors for complications. None;None.
